name: 迷宫坦克大战
description:
Hello, this is an experimental project with a small gameplay. The gameplay is as straightforward as the name, manipulate your character in the maze, destroy the wall to find the opponent, or just sneak attack! ! ! A duel to decide who gets to pay the bills or do the dishes...or any other rock-paper-scissors problem.
Although you can choose to practice with the AI, we still recommend you to bring your friends to play the game together: D Of course, this is not because the AI is too difficult to play~

Move: A, W, S, D
Rotating lens: Q, E
Fire: Right mouse button
Smoke Bomb: Space

But I'm sorry in advance, our server and various settings are still not stable enough, and various situations may arise, please understand.
If you have any ideas or questions, you are welcome to join the QQ group: 833422358

Hope you have fun and happy hunting (or being hunted)!
